title: Drawing, "Ceiling Design", 1725–75
medium:
Red chalk, red, pale gray wash
Support: paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper right: "S/Anna"; Inscribed in pen and brown ink at lower left: "Vittorio Bi=/gari fece"; on verso in the same hand: "Appartiene ad A./Maggiori il quale lo compro in/ Bologna/ nel 1791 (or 1792)
provenance: Mr. & Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee Giovanni Piancastelli
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ceiling Design", 1725–75.
1725–75. Red chalk, red, pale gray wash
Support: paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4310.
